name: Michael Shapiro
description: I enjoy living life to it’s fullest. I don’t want to look back on life and ‘wished’ I would have done something but didn’t…then cant because I’m too old. I can stay home on weekends, but enjoy being out and about. Don’t get me wrong, I enjoy watching movies at home especially when it’s cold and dreary out. I tell my friends I’m shy, but they don’t believe me. Once you get to know me, I can be quite witty. I have two kids, one that lives with me full time and the other part time (he is adopted and has Down Syndrome). Both boys are truly the light of my heart. I can describe myself in two ways – simple and down to earth. I’m very humble, not shy and like to be upfront. I want to find someone that is interested in the things that I like to do. Must love the outdoors.
